characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a red car, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. The white sedan ahead is maintaining a steady speed. A red car on the left side is overtaking the self-driving vehicle. A motorcyclist on the right side is moving forward. The red car is moving closer to the self-driving vehicle, potentially indicating a cut-in behavior.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while keeping a safe distance from the white sedan ahead. The red car on the left side is overtaking the self-driving vehicle, and the motorcyclist on the right side is moving forward.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, maintaining a steady speed. 2) Left: A red car, approximately 2 meters away, overtaking the self-driving vehicle. 3) Right: A motorcyclist, approximately 3 meters away, moving forward.

characters: Driver of a red Volkswagen, driver of a yellow truck
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road. Ahead, a red Volkswagen is in the same lane, and a yellow truck is in the adjacent right lane. The traffic is moving slowly.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed, keeping a safe distance from the red Volkswagen ahead. The yellow truck in the adjacent right lane is moving at a similar pace.
key_objects: 1) Front: A red Volkswagen, approximately 5 meters away, moving slowly. 2) Right: A yellow truck, approximately 3 meters away, moving slowly in the adjacent lane.
